overview: There is a man here. His name is Usada Heikichi. A humble office worker with a wife and a daughter. Both at home and at work, he is ridiculed as a sick and useless man. However, this man was a righteous man who hated evil, "Rabbitman". The year is 1990, and the place is Osaka. A series of disappearance cases of beautiful women are caused by the evil group "Pachi Pachi" who turns beautiful women into remodeled humans and aims to conquer the world. A man of justice, "Rabbitman," appears there, and with his dazzling special karate-killing techniques, the great evil will eventually perish. A  hero movie born from the popular Kansai TV program "Endless Night".
title: Rabbitman Story
